price: 12 Déjà, avant eux, le peuple de Noé, les habitants d’Ar-Rass[1305] et les Thamoud avaient crié au mensonge,
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: kadhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin wa-aṣḥābu al-rasi wathamūdu
